channel.title: Deltascape help...! argh!
channel.description:
ok so i have a client.... and mennos source (delta) ... everything was goin fine i set the server ip in the gui file of the client to 0.0.0.0 and i could log in fine... then i uploaded and sent the client to a friend to see if he could log in to my server with me... and he couldnt, kept saying stuff like "your password is incorrect" and "your account is already logged in" etc.. . so he told me to change the ip in the gui to my server ip "d33jscape.no-ip.biz".... (in the client files.... not the server files) now i cant log in myself... says "error connecting to server"
any help please??? thanks in advance

item.title: Deltascape help...! argh!
item.dc:creator: @ledgman ledgman
item.description:
@ledgman wrote:

Rofl you need to create 2 duplicate clients.

One for your friend with the ip set to your no-ip.
The other will be YOUR client with the server ip set to 127.0.0.1.

YOU log into 127.0.0.1 your local host and your players log into your no-ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape help...! argh!
item.dc:creator: @djmorgan92 djmorgan92
item.description:
@djmorgan92 wrote:

my friend changed the ip on the client i sent him to d33jscape.no-ip.biz and he still couldnt log in… now ive changed it in my files to 127.0.0.1 and i can log in again…

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape help...! argh!
item.dc:creator: @lvl_3_claws lvl 3 claws
item.description:
@lvl_3_claws wrote:

are you sure that ur running ur server and is it ur server… outher wise u need to add pics
